headline: Grindr names veteran executive John North as finance chief
summary: Dating app Grindr on Wednesday named John North as its finance chief, replacing Vanna Krantz. North stepped down as CEO of U.S. recreational vehicles retailer Lazydays Holdings last year. Krantz, in July, had said she would step down once a successor is named.
